title: Maryam Nawaz bolsters minorities’ confidence: Info Minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 22 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb on Wednesday said Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz Senior Vice President and Chief Organiser Marayam Nawaz had bolstered the confidence of the minorities by participating in the PML-N’s minority wing’s meeting.
Posting the pictures showing the members of the minority community giving gifts to the PML-N leader on her Twitter handle, the minister said Maryam Nawaz also reciprocated their love for her.
The snaps were not mere pictures but a true reflection of Pakistan being a federal state, she added.
